      • getEntity

        com.haulmont.cuba.core.entity.Entity<?> getEntity(org.camunda.bpm.engine.delegate.DelegateExecution execution)
        Parameters:
        execution - camunda execution. This variable is a built-in variable of camunda engine, hence available for expression.
        Returns:
        Entity object according to process instance business key. Entity will be loaded using _local view by default. In order to use another view, see function below.

      • getEntity

        com.haulmont.cuba.core.entity.Entity<?> getEntity(org.camunda.bpm.engine.delegate.DelegateExecution execution,
                                                  java.lang.String viewName)
        Parameters:
        execution - camunda execution. This variable is a built-in variable of camunda engine, hence available for expression.
        viewName - name of cuba view to load entity
        Returns:
        Entity object according to process instance business key. Entity will be loaded using given view name.
